newsitem.title: UK: Hiscox switches from MGAM - paper.
newsitem.headline: Hiscox switches from MGAM - paper.

text.p: Morgan Grenfell Asset Management (MGAM) has lost a contract to manage the investments of Hiscox Select Insurance Plc, the Financial Times said on Tuesday.
The paper said Hiscox had taken the decision to change investment managers to Baillie Gifford due to disappointment with the level of returns while MGAM was managing.
Hiscox Select uses its assets to support underwriting activities at Lloyd's of London, the newspaper said.
